Plot chapters over time (multi-timepoint means)

plot_chapters_over_time.Rd

Create a plot showing means over chapter timepoints using rempsyc::plot_means_over_time for the wide-format response variables.

Usage

plot_chapters_over_time(
  chapters,
  dv = "score",
  xtitle = "Chapter",
  ytitle = "Simulated scores",
  plot_title = TRUE,
  ci_type = "between",
  legend.position = "bottom",
  text_size = 20,
  reverse_score = FALSE,
  error_bars = TRUE,
  neutrality_line = TRUE
)

Arguments

chapters

A data frame or list of simulation rows containing columns book, chapter, and the desired dv.

dv

Character. Name of the column to plot as the dependent variable (default: "score").

xtitle

Character. X-axis label.

ytitle

Character. Y-axis label.

plot_title

Logical. Whether to include a title.

ci_type

Character. Type of confidence interval to pass to rempsyc::plot_means_over_time.

legend.position

Position for legend.

text_size

Numeric. Base text size for axis/title text.

reverse_score

Logical. Whether to reverse score scale using rempsyc::nice_reverse.

error_bars

Logical. Show error bars.

neutrality_line

Logical. Add a horizontal neutrality line at 50.

Value

A ggplot2 object.
